targets.query:
from(bucket: "home/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r.meter == "main" and r._field == "Total_W")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

import "experimental"

maxStop = if v.timeRangeStop > now() then now() else v.timeRangeStop
limitedStop = experimental.addDuration(
    d: 2m,
    to: v.timeRangeStart,
)
limitedStart = experimental.subDuration(
    d: 2m,
    from: maxStop,
)

// ----

exportmin = from(bucket: "home/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: limitedStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == "Total_Export_kWh")
  |> first()

exportmax = from(bucket: "home/autogen")
  |> range(start: limitedStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == "Total_Export_kWh")
  |> last()

exporttotal = join(tables: {a: exportmin, b: exportmax}, on: ["_measurement"], method: "inner")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value_b - r._value_a }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _x: "x" }))
  
// ----

solarmin = from(bucket: "home/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: limitedStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "solar" and r._field == "total_yield")
  |> first()

solarmax = from(bucket: "home/autogen")
  |> range(start: limitedStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "solar" and r._field == "total_yield")
  |> last()

solartotal = join(tables: {a: solarmin, b: solarmax}, on: ["_measurement"], method: "inner")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value_b - r._value_a }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _x: "x" }))

// ----

selfusage = join(tables: {a: solartotal, b: exporttotal}, on: ["_x"], method: "inner")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value_a - r._value_b }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _x: "x" }))

// ----

importmin = from(bucket: "home/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: limitedStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == "Total_Import_kWh")
  |> first()

importmax = from(bucket: "home/autogen")
  |> range(start: limitedStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == "Total_Import_kWh")
  |> last()

importtotal = join(tables: {a: importmin, b: importmax}, on: ["_measurement"], method: "inner")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value_b - r._value_a }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _x: "x" }))

//-------

join(tables: {a: selfusage, b: importtotal}, on: ["_x"], method: "inner")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _bruto: r._value_a + r._value_b }))

import "experimental"

maxStop = if v.timeRangeStop > now() then now() else v.timeRangeStop
limitedStop = experimental.addDuration(
    d: 2m,
    to: v.timeRangeStart,
)
limitedStart = experimental.subDuration(
    d: 2m,
    from: maxStop,
)


min = from(bucket: "home/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: limitedStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == "Total_Import_kWh")
  |> first()

max = from(bucket: "home/autogen")
  |> range(start: limitedStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == "Total_Import_kWh")
  |> last()


join(tables: {min: min, max: max}, on: ["_measurement"], method: "inner")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _netto: r._value_max - r._value_min }))

import "experimental"

maxStop = if v.timeRangeStop > now() then now() else v.timeRangeStop
limitedStop = experimental.addDuration(
    d: 2m,
    to: v.timeRangeStart,
)
limitedStart = experimental.subDuration(

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: limitedStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "solar" and r._field == "total_yield")
  |> first()

solarmax = from(bucket: "home/autogen")
  |> range(start: limitedStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "solar" and r._field == "total_yield")
  |> last()

join(tables: {a: solarmin, b: solarmax}, on: ["_measurement"], method: "inner")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _bruto: r._value_b - r._value_a }))

import "experimental"

maxStop = if v.timeRangeStop > now() then now() else v.timeRangeStop
limitedStop = experimental.addDuration(
    d: 2m,
    to: v.timeRangeStart,
)
limitedStart = experimental.subDuration(
    d: 2m,
    from: maxStop,
)

// ----

exportmin = from(bucket: "home/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: limitedStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == "Total_Export_kWh")
  |> first()

exportmax = from(bucket: "home/autogen")
  |> range(start: limitedStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == "Total_Export_kWh")
  |> last()

join(tables: {a: exportmin, b: exportmax}, on: ["_measurement"], method: "inner")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _injection: r._value_b - r._value_a }))

import "experimental"

maxStop = if v.timeRangeStop > now() then now() else v.timeRangeStop
limitedStop = experimental.addDuration(
    d: 2m,
    to: v.timeRangeStart,
)
limitedStart = experimental.subDuration(
    d: 2m,
    from: maxStop,
)

// ----

exportmin = from(bucket: "home/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: limitedStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == "Total_Export_kWh")
  |> first()

exportmax = from(bucket: "home/autogen")
  |> range(start: limitedStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == "Total_Export_kWh")
  |> last()

exporttotal = join(tables: {a: exportmin, b: exportmax}, on: ["_measurement"], method: "inner")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value_b - r._value_a }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _x: "x" }))


// -----

solarmin = from(bucket: "home/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: limitedStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "solar" and r._field == "total_yield")
  |> first()

solarmax = from(bucket: "home/autogen")
  |> range(start: limitedStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "solar" and r._field == "total_yield")
  |> last()

solartotal = join(tables: {a: solarmin, b: solarmax}, on: ["_measurement"], method: "inner")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value_b - r._value_a }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _x: "x" }))

// -----

join(tables: {a: solartotal, b: exporttotal}, on: ["_x"], method: "inner")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value_b / r._value_a }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _ratio: 1.0 - r._value }))

from(bucket: "home/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Total_W")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "home/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r.meter == "main" and r._field == "L1_W")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "home/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r.meter == "main" and r._field == "L2_W")

from(bucket: "home/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy" and r._field == "L3_W")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "home/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "solar" and r._field == "DC_Watt_A")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "home/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "solar" and r._field == "DC_Watt_B")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
